Summary: This is an abduction case that happened in philadelphia around 1959
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness claims he was abducted from his home, by aliens, when he was in third grade.[ 1959 ] he claims his grandfather was abducted with him...Two Mufon investigators had an interview with the witness on Dec 7 2009 at 2:30 pm. The lead investigator is Bill Stephenson and the second investigator is Ken Pfeifer State Section Director in New Jersey. This case will include many sightings both in Philadelpjia and Camden New Jersey . This case will also involve family members of the witness John Holmes. Bill Stephenson will fill in all the details and info we have acquired during the interview. Photos will follow per the witness. The interview was recorded by investigator Bill Stephenson at his home in Sicklerville New Jersey. Major George Filer State Director For Mufon in New Jersey will be contacted for a possible hypnosis session with the witness.
